description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前正国级领导人，曾任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席、中共上海市委书记、中共湖北省委书记、建设部部长等职务。
description.en: A former national-level leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Committee of the CPC, Secretary of the Hubei Provincial Committee of the CPC, and Minister of Construction.

description.zh-cn: 俞正声之父，曾任中华人民共和国天津市首任市长、第一机械工业部首任部长。早年曾与江青同居，并为其入党介绍人。
description.en: Father of Yu Zhengsheng, served as the first mayor of Tianjin, People's Republic of China, and the first minister of the First Ministry of Machine Building. He lived with Jiang Qing in his early years and was her sponsor for joining the Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 俞正声之母，曾任北京市政协主席。
description.en: Mother of Yu Zhengsheng, former Chairwoman of the Beijing Municipal Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 俞正声的妻子，张震寰之女。
description.en: Wife of Yu Zhengsheng, daughter of Zhang Zhenhuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国原国防科学技术委员会主任，张志凯之父。
description.en: Former Director of the National Defense Science and Technology Commission of the People's Republic of China, father of Zhang Zhikai.

description.zh-cn: 俞正声长兄，曾任中华人民共和国国家安全部北美情报司司长、外事局主任，1986年叛逃至美国。
description.en: Elder brother of Yu Zhengsheng, former Director of the North American Intelligence Department and Director of the Foreign Affairs Bureau of the Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China, who defected to the United States in 1986.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国一场持续十年的全国性政治运动。
description.en: A decade-long nationwide political movement in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，邓小平长子。
description.en: Chinese politician, eldest son of Deng Xiaoping.

nodes.id: 中国残疾人福利基金会

zh-cn: 中国残疾人福利基金会

description.zh-cn: 中国的残疾人事业机构。
description.en: An organization for disabled persons in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国铁道部最后一任部长，后因腐败问题落马。
description.en: The last Minister of Railways of the People's Republic of China, who was later dismissed due to corruption.

description.zh-cn: 刘志军的胞弟。
description.en: Younger brother of Liu Zhijun.

description.zh-cn: 越南裔法国籍女商人，与多名中国高级官员有不正当关系。
description.en: A Vietnamese-born French businesswoman involved in improper relationships with several high-ranking Chinese officials.

description.zh-cn: 原中共山东省委副书记、青岛市委书记，后因腐败问题落马。
description.en: Former Deputy Secretary of the Shandong Provincial Committee of the CPC and Secretary of the Qingdao Municipal Committee, who was later dismissed due to corruption.

description.zh-cn: 2010年11月15日发生在中国上海市静安区的一起特别重大火灾事故。
description.en: A particularly serious fire accident that occurred on November 15, 2010, in Jing'an District, Shanghai, China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党上海市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党上海市委员会
en: Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在上海市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 2010年在中国上海市举行的世界博览会。
description.en: A World Expo held in Shanghai, China in 2010.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
en: Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Current General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国性组织。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任全国政协主席，接替俞正声职务。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC, succeeding Yu Zhengsheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任全国政协主席，是俞正声的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC, the predecessor of Yu Zhengsheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国副主席。曾任俞正声在上海的副手，并接替其书记职务。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Vice President of the People's Republic of China. He served as Yu Zhengsheng's deputy in Shanghai and succeeded him as Party Secretary.

nodes.id: 中国共产党湖北省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党湖北省委员会
en: Hubei Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在湖北省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Hubei Province.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的第四任妻子，“四人帮”成员之一。
description.en: The fourth wife of Mao Zedong and a member of the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京市的一所著名中学。
description.en: A renowned high school located in Beijing.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军国防科技大学

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防科技大学

description.zh-cn: 中国顶尖军事院校，前身为哈尔滨军事工程学院。
description.en: A top military academy in China, formerly known as the Harbin Military Engineering Institute.

description.zh-cn: 俞正声是俞启威（黄敬）的儿子。
description.en: Yu Zhengsheng is the son of Yu Qiwei (Huang Jing).

description.zh-cn: 俞正声是范瑾的儿子。
description.en: Yu Zhengsheng is the son of Fan Jin.

description.zh-cn: 俞正声与张志凯是夫妻关系。
description.en: Yu Zhengsheng and Zhang Zhikai are husband and wife.

description.zh-cn: 张志凯是张震寰的女儿。
description.en: Zhang Zhikai is the daughter of Zhang Zhenhuan.

description.zh-cn: 俞强声是俞正声的大哥。
description.en: Yu Qiangsheng is Yu Zhengsheng's elder brother.

description.zh-cn: 因母亲范瑾在文革中被打倒，俞正声毕业后被分配到河北张家口的工厂当技术员，影响了其早期职业生涯。
description.en: Because his mother Fan Jin was overthrown during the Cultural Revolution, Yu Zhengsheng was assigned to a factory in Zhangjiakou, Hebei as a technician after graduation, which affected his early career.

description.zh-cn: 1984年，受好友邓朴方力邀，俞正声出任中国残疾人福利基金会负责人。
description.en: In 1984, at the strong invitation of his friend Deng Pufang, Yu Zhengsheng became the head of the China Disabled Persons' Federation.

description.zh-cn: 文本描述邓朴方为俞正声的好友。
description.en: The text describes Deng Pufang as a good friend of Yu Zhengsheng.

description.zh-cn: 刘志军在俞正声主政湖北期间，将巨资投入湖北铁路和车站建设，为俞正声树立政绩。
description.en: While Yu Zhengsheng was in charge of Hubei, Liu Zhijun invested huge sums in the construction of railways and stations in Hubei, thereby building up political achievements for Yu.

description.zh-cn: 据报道，在俞正声的运作下，本该处以死刑的刘志祥（刘志军的胞弟）被判处死缓。
description.en: It is reported that under Yu Zhengsheng's maneuvering, Liu Zhixiang (Liu Zhijun's younger brother), who should have been sentenced to death, was given a suspended death sentence.

description.zh-cn: 据中国大陆媒体《财经》杂志暗指，俞正声曾涉入与李薇的不伦关系。
description.en: According to the mainland Chinese media outlet Caijing Magazine, it was implied that Yu Zhengsheng was involved in an illicit affair with Li Wei.

description.zh-cn: 杜世成是俞正声当年一手提拔的亲信。
description.en: Du Shicheng was a close confidant promoted by Yu Zhengsheng.

description.zh-cn: 火灾后，民众对上海市政府的救灾活动表达不满，问责直指时任市委书记俞正声的“懒政作风”，损害了其声誉。
description.en: After the fire, the public expressed dissatisfaction with the disaster relief efforts of the Shanghai municipal government, with accountability directed at the "lazy governance style" of then-Party Secretary Yu Zhengsheng, damaging his reputation.

relationships.target: 中国共产党上海市委员会

description.zh-cn: 俞正声主政上海期间，成功举办了2010年上海世博会，但也因经济停滞、外来人口激增等问题引发争议和市民不满。
description.en: During his tenure as the head of Shanghai, Yu Zhengsheng successfully hosted the 2010 Shanghai Expo, but also faced controversy and public dissatisfaction due to issues such as economic stagnation and a sharp increase in the migrant population.

relationships.target: 中国共产党湖北省委员会
中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

position.en: Member of the Politburo Standing Committee

description.zh-cn: 在习近平担任中共中央总书记期间，俞正声任中央政治局常委。
description.en: While Xi Jinping served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, Yu Zhengsheng was a member of the Politburo Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 汪洋接替俞正声，担任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席职务。
description.en: Wang Yang succeeded Yu Zhengsheng as the Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 俞正声接替贾庆林，担任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席职务。
description.en: Yu Zhengsheng succeeded Jia Qinglin as the Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在俞正声担任中共上海市委书记期间，韩正任副书记兼市长。
description.en: While Yu Zhengsheng was the Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee, Han Zheng served as Deputy Secretary and Mayor.

description.zh-cn: 俞启威（黄敬）早年曾与江青同居。
description.en: Yu Qiwei (Huang Jing) lived with Jiang Qing in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 俞启威（黄敬）是江青的入党介绍人。
description.en: Yu Qiwei (Huang Jing) was Jiang Qing's sponsor for joining the Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 俞正声于1963年毕业于北京市第四中学。
description.en: Yu Zhengsheng graduated from Beijing No. 4 High School in 1963.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军国防科技大学

description.zh-cn: 俞正声曾就读于哈尔滨军事工程学院（现中国人民解放军国防科技大学），并于1968年毕业。
description.en: Yu Zhengsheng studied at the Harbin Military Engineering Institute (now the National University of Defense Technology) and graduated in 1968.
